DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the impact on body mass index (BMI) of a 5-session childhood obesity intervention for African American families among children aged 5-12 years. We hypothesize that children participating in the program will experience a reduction in BMI.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of a Childhood Obesity Intervention for African American Families
DOC.criteria: BMI greater than or equal to the 85th percentile for age and sex Attends an elementary school in the Pittsburg Unified School District in California Parent of child meeting above criteria
